org.apache.spark.ml.classification

接口 NaiveBayesParams

  • 所有超级接口:
    HasFeaturesCol, HasLabelCol, HasPredictionCol, HasWeightCol, Identifiable, Params, PredictorParams, java.io.Serializable
    所有已知实现类:
    NaiveBayes, NaiveBayesModel

    public interface NaiveBayesParams
extends PredictorParams, HasWeightCol
    Params for Naive Bayes Classifiers.

    • 方法概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • getModelType

        String getModelType()

      • getSmoothing

        double getSmoothing()

      • modelType

        Param<String> modelType()
        The model type which is a string (case-sensitive). Supported options: "multinomial" and "bernoulli". (default = multinomial)
        返回:
        (undocumented)

      • smoothing

        DoubleParam smoothing()
        The smoothing parameter. (default = 1.0).
        返回:
        (undocumented)
